name: HOOGE 3D Engine
short_description:
HOOGE is an acronym for 'Hopefully Object Orientated Gaming Engine'.
The Goal of this engine is for new developers to learn the required skills to develop a fully object orientated game engine and to use this engine to produce a marketable game
